trans-unit.source: (1 or 0) When use_locks is enabled this features suppresses warnings when trying to edit an object you have already locked. When enabled, external editor will always “borrow” the existing lock token instead of doing the locking itself. This is useful when using CMFStaging for instance. If omitted, this option defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: (1 or 0) When use_locks is enabled this features suppresses warnings when trying to edit an object you have already locked. When enabled, external editor will always “borrow” the existing lock token instead of doing the locking itself. This is useful when using CMFStaging for instance. If omitted, this option defaults to 0.

trans-unit.source: (1 or 0) Whether to delete the temp files created. WARNING the temp file coming from the browser contains authentication information and therefore setting this to 0 is a security risk, especially on shared machines. If set to 1, that file is deleted at the earliest opportunity, before the editor is even spawned. Set to 0 for debugging only.
trans-unit.target: (1 or 0) Whether to delete the temp files created. WARNING the temp file coming from the browser contains authentication information and therefore setting this to 0 is a security risk, especially on shared machines. If set to 1, that file is deleted at the earliest opportunity, before the editor is even spawned. Set to 0 for debugging only.

trans-unit.source: (1 or 0) Whether to include the whole path to the object including the hostname in the file name (the default) or just the id of the object being edited. Turn this option off for shorter file names in your editors, and for editors that don’t like long names.
trans-unit.target: (1 or 0) Whether to include the whole path to the object including the hostname in the file name (the default) or just the id of the object being edited. Turn this option off for shorter file names in your editors, and for editors that don’t like long names.

trans-unit.source: (1 or 0) Whether to use WebDAV locking. The user editing must have the proper WebDAV related permissions for this to work.
trans-unit.target: (1 or 0) Whether to use WebDAV locking. The user editing must have the proper WebDAV related permissions for this to work.

trans-unit.source: (float) The interval in seconds that the helper application checks the edited file for changes.
trans-unit.target: (float) The interval in seconds that the helper application checks the edited file for changes.

trans-unit.source: (path) Path to store local copies of object data being edited. Defaults to operating system temp directory. Note: this setting has no apparent effect on Windows 8^(
trans-unit.target: (path) Path to store local copies of object data being edited. Defaults to operating system temp directory. Note: this setting has no apparent effect on Windows 8^(

trans-unit.source: (string) Character or characters used to separate path elements in long files names used by external editor. Defaults to a comma (,). This must be a legal character for use in file names on your platorm (i.e., don’t use a path separator character!). This option is ignored if ‘long_file_name’ is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: (string) Character or characters used to separate path elements in long files names used by external editor. Defaults to a comma (,). This must be a legal character for use in file names on your platorm (i.e., don’t use a path separator character!). This option is ignored if ‘long_file_name’ is set to 0.

trans-unit.source: (text) The file extension to add to the content file. Allows better handling of images and can improve syntax highlighting.
trans-unit.target: (text) The file extension to add to the content file. Allows better handling of images and can improve syntax highlighting.

trans-unit.source: ). Several sections can be added for each domain level if desired.
trans-unit.target: ). Several sections can be added for each domain level if desired.

trans-unit.source: directly before the object to be edited. You could do this in ZPT using some TAL in a Page Template like:
trans-unit.target: directly before the object to be edited. You could do this in ZPT using some TAL in a Page Template like:

trans-unit.source: Adapt tests to Zope 4.
trans-unit.target: 适应Zope 4的测试。

trans-unit.source: Add “.zem” file extension support for MacOS X (especially Mac IE), to ease helper app integration where MIME support is lacking. Thanks to Zac Bir.
trans-unit.target: Add “.zem” file extension support for MacOS X (especially Mac IE), to ease helper app integration where MIME support is lacking. Thanks to Zac Bir.

trans-unit.source: Add Dreamweaver plugin contributed by Manuel Aristarann. Thanks also to Anton Stonor.
trans-unit.target: 添加Manuel Aristarann贡献的Dreamweaver插件。也感谢Anton Stonor。

trans-unit.source: Add ZMI support for Zope 2.7’s ordered folder objects.
trans-unit.target: Add ZMI support for Zope 2.7’s ordered folder objects.

trans-unit.source: Add a simple callback registry that can be used to add extra metadata headers or set special response headers when a file is edited through External Editor.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个简单的回调注册表,当通过外部编辑器编辑文件时,可以用来添加额外的元数据头或设置特殊的响应头。

trans-unit.source: Add external editor icon to ZMI breadcrumbs for editable objects.
trans-unit.target: 为可编辑对象的ZMI面包屑添加外部编辑器图标。

trans-unit.source: Add needed dependencies in
trans-unit.target: 添加所需的依赖性

trans-unit.source: Added “long_file_name” and “file_name_separator” config options.
trans-unit.target: Added “long_file_name” and “file_name_separator” config options.

trans-unit.source: Added “temp_dir” configuration option for specifying a different temp file directory then the OS default. Also further improved temp file name generation.
trans-unit.target: Added “temp_dir” configuration option for specifying a different temp file directory then the OS default. Also further improved temp file name generation.

trans-unit.source: Added ‘skip_data’ option to make External Editor send out only the metadata part and skip appending data to the ‘body’.
trans-unit.target: Added ‘skip_data’ option to make External Editor send out only the metadata part and skip appending data to the ‘body’.

trans-unit.source: Added –version command line argument
trans-unit.target: Added –version command line argument

trans-unit.source: Added HomeSite plugin (win32)
trans-unit.target: 添加了HomeSite插件(win32)。

trans-unit.source: Added Photoshop plugin (win32)
trans-unit.target: 添加了Photoshop插件(win32)。

trans-unit.source: Added SSL support to Windows binary package. Thanks to Federico Sevilla III
trans-unit.target: 为 Windows 二进制包添加了 SSL 支持。感谢 Federico Sevilla III

trans-unit.source: Added a workaround for non-compliant SSL servers. The software now silently ignores “EOF occurred in violation of protocol” errors coming from httplib. Thanks to Christopher Deckard.
trans-unit.target: Added a workaround for non-compliant SSL servers. The software now silently ignores “EOF occurred in violation of protocol” errors coming from httplib. Thanks to Christopher Deckard.

trans-unit.source: Added binary build support for Windows using py2exe and Inno setup.
trans-unit.target: 使用py2exe和Inno设置增加了对Windows的二进制构建支持。

trans-unit.source: Added caching headers to prevent client-side caching of edit data. Thanks to Gabriel Genellina for pointing this out.
trans-unit.target: 添加了缓存头以防止客户端缓存编辑数据。感谢 Gabriel Genellina 指出了这一点。

trans-unit.source: Added improved support for editing CMF documents
trans-unit.target: 增加了对编辑CMF文件的改进支持

trans-unit.source: Added patch for Zope find template so that you can use external editor directly from find results in the ZMI. Thanks to Jim Washington.
trans-unit.target: 为 Zope 查找模板添加了补丁,这样你就可以直接在 ZMI 的查找结果中使用外部编辑器。感谢 Jim Washington。

trans-unit.source: Added plugins for Microsoft Word, Excel and Powerpoint.
trans-unit.target: 增加了Microsoft Word、Excel和Powerpoint的插件。

trans-unit.source: Added support for domain specific configuration options.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对域特定配置选项的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for unaware mimetype browser - we now add the .zem extension no matter what the user-agent
trans-unit.target: 增加了对不知情的mimetype浏览器的支持--无论用户代理是什么,我们现在都会添加.zem扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Added the capability to borrow exising DAV locks. This allows external editor to play well with other systems using locks, such as CMFStaging. A new configuration flag, always_borrow_locks can be set to suppress the borrow lock warning dialog when editing.
trans-unit.target: 增加了借用现有DAV锁的功能.这允许外部编辑器与其他使用锁的系统(如 CMFStaging)进行良好的配合。一个新的配置标志,always_borrow_locks 可以被设置为在编辑时抑制借锁警告对话框.

trans-unit.source: Added the man page from the Debian distro. Thanks go out to Federico Sevilla III and Andreas Tille
trans-unit.target: 添加了Debian发行版的man页面。感谢 Federico Sevilla III 和 Andreas Tille。

trans-unit.source: Added tip for configuring IE to save files over SSL. Thanks to Jonah Bossewitch.
trans-unit.target: 添加了配置IE通过SSL保存文件的技巧。感谢 Jonah Bossewitch。

trans-unit.source: Added win32 editor plugin support for the helper application.
trans-unit.target: 增加了win32编辑器插件对帮助程序的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added working distutils setup for Unix.
trans-unit.target: 为Unix添加了工作的distutils设置。

trans-unit.source: Additional sections can apply to a particular domain, content-type or meta-type. Since objects can have all these properties, the options are applied in this order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 附加部分可以应用于特定的域、内容类型或元类型。由于对象可以拥有所有这些属性,所以选项按这个优先顺序应用。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also pass the path the object you want to edit directly to the
trans-unit.target: 作为一个替代方案,你也可以将你要编辑的对象的路径直接传递给

trans-unit.source: Associate any client-side editor application with any Zope object by meta-type or content-type. Both text and binary object content can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 通过元类型或内容类型将任何客户端编辑应用程序与任何Zope对象关联。文本和二进制对象内容都可以被编辑。

trans-unit.source: Automatically saves changes back to Zope without ending the editing session.
trans-unit.target: 在不结束编辑会话的情况下,自动将更改保存回Zope。

trans-unit.source: Because plugins do not require the path of the editor application to work, you can simply specify the plugin module name for your editor in the configuration file if desired. For example, to specify Photoshop for all image files, use add the following section to your config file (ZopeEdit.ini on Windows):
trans-unit.target: 因为插件不需要编辑器应用程序的路径来工作,如果需要的话,您可以简单地在配置文件中为您的编辑器指定插件模块名称。例如,要为所有的图像文件指定Photoshop,使用添加以下部分到您的配置文件(Windows上的ZopeEdit.ini)。

trans-unit.source: Built Windows helper app using Python 2.2.2 and PythonWin 148.
trans-unit.target: 使用Python 2.2.2和PythonWin 148构建Windows帮助程序。

trans-unit.source: Can add file extensions automatically to improve syntax highlighting or file type detection.
trans-unit.target: 可以自动添加文件扩展名,提高语法高亮或文件类型检测。

trans-unit.source: Casey Duncan
trans-unit.target: 凯西-邓肯

trans-unit.source: Change default configuration to use .txt extension for text/plain only. Add extensions for css and javascript files.
trans-unit.target: 更改默认配置,只使用.txt扩展名来处理文本/纯文本。增加css和javascript文件的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Changes to documents intermittently may not have been saved back to Zope when using any plugin that involved COM (Word, Excel, Powerpoint, etc).
trans-unit.target: 当使用任何涉及COM(Word、Excel、Powerpoint等)的插件时,对文档间歇性的修改可能没有被保存回Zope。

trans-unit.source: Check if the editor was launched before locking the file in Zope. This prevents errors if the editor is closed before the lock request completes.
trans-unit.target: 检查编辑器是否在Zope中锁定文件之前被启动。这防止了在锁定请求完成之前编辑器被关闭的错误。

trans-unit.source: Command line or plugin name used to invoke the editor application. On Windows, if no editor setting is found for an object you edit, the helper app will search the file type registry for an appropriate editor based on the content-type or file extension of the object (which can be specified using the extension option below). By default, the file path of the local file being edited is appended to this command line. To insert the file path in the middle of your command, use “$1” for Unix and “%1” for Windows respectively.
trans-unit.target: Command line or plugin name used to invoke the editor application. On Windows, if no editor setting is found for an object you edit, the helper app will search the file type registry for an appropriate editor based on the content-type or file extension of the object (which can be specified using the extension option below). By default, the file path of the local file being edited is appended to this command line. To insert the file path in the middle of your command, use “$1” for Unix and “%1” for Windows respectively.

trans-unit.source: Compiled windows helper app binary using Python 2.3.4, Pythonwin build 163 and py2exe 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 使用Python 2.3.4、Pythonwin build 163和py2exe 0.5编译windows helper应用程序二进制。

trans-unit.source: Conclusion
trans-unit.target: 结论

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: 配置

trans-unit.source: Corrected and added tests
trans-unit.target: 纠正和增加测试

trans-unit.source: Detecting whether the client has External Editor installed from within IE using JavaScript or VBScript is now possible, assuming that the client software is installed via the InnoSetup installer. See “win32/ocx.txt” for more info.
trans-unit.target: Detecting whether the client has External Editor installed from within IE using JavaScript or VBScript is now possible, assuming that the client software is installed via the InnoSetup installer. See “win32/ocx.txt” for more info.

trans-unit.source: Determine the correct editor to launch for a given Zope object
trans-unit.target: 为给定的Zope对象确定正确的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Do not ask the user what editor to use on Posix platforms. Instead just tell the user to edit the config file. The askstring() function does not work with a hidden root Tk window in Python 2.3.4. Thanks to Christopher Mann.
trans-unit.target: 不要问用户在Posix平台上使用什么编辑器。相反,只要告诉用户编辑配置文件即可。askstring()函数在Python 2.3.4中的隐藏根Tk窗口中无法使用。感谢Christopher Mann。

trans-unit.source: Document Zope version compatibility [dataflake]
trans-unit.target: 文件Zope版本兼容性[dataflake]

trans-unit.source: Don’t emit a warning about deprecated ‘methods’ in Zope >= 2.10.
trans-unit.target: Don’t emit a warning about deprecated ‘methods’ in Zope >= 2.10.

trans-unit.source: Dreamweaver
trans-unit.target: Dreamweaver

trans-unit.source: Drop support for Python 2.6.
trans-unit.target: 放弃对Python 2.6的支持。

trans-unit.source: Edit objects locally, directly from the ZMI.
trans-unit.target: 直接从ZMI本地编辑对象。

trans-unit.source: Editor Plugins
trans-unit.target: 编辑插件

trans-unit.source: Eliminated spurious “Editor did not launch” errors on short sessions or when other errors occurred.
trans-unit.target: Eliminated spurious “Editor did not launch” errors on short sessions or when other errors occurred.

trans-unit.source: Every so often (if so configured), the helper app stats the content file to see if it has been changed. If so, it sends an HTTP PUT request back to Zope containing the new data.
trans-unit.target: 每隔一段时间(如果有配置的话),helper应用程序就会统计内容文件,以查看它是否被更改。如果有,它就会向Zope发送一个包含新数据的HTTP PUT请求。

trans-unit.source: External Editor also defines a global method that you can call to insert pencil icon links for appropriate objects. The method automatically checks if the object supports external editing and whether the user has the “Use external editor” permission for that object. If both are true, it returns the HTML code to insert the external editor icon link. Otherwise it returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: External Editor also defines a global method that you can call to insert pencil icon links for appropriate objects. The method automatically checks if the object supports external editing and whether the user has the “Use external editor” permission for that object. If both are true, it returns the HTML code to insert the external editor icon link. Otherwise it returns an empty string.

trans-unit.source: External Editor now compatible with objects that return a “filestream iterator” in Zope 2.7.1+. (if upgrading: this fix does not require an update to EE client, just the EE Zope product).
trans-unit.target: External Editor now compatible with objects that return a “filestream iterator” in Zope 2.7.1+. (if upgrading: this fix does not require an update to EE client, just the EE Zope product).

trans-unit.source: External editing is governed by the permission “Use external editor”. Users with this permission can launch external editor from editable objects. In order to save changes, users will need additional permissions appropriate for the objects they are editing.
trans-unit.target: External editing is governed by the permission “Use external editor”. Users with this permission can launch external editor from editable objects. In order to save changes, users will need additional permissions appropriate for the objects they are editing.

trans-unit.source: External editing is now governed by the “Use external editor” permission to allow non-managers to use it. Users must also have the permissions to edit/modify the objects they edit, plus do WebDAV locking if desired. Thanks to Reineke and others.
trans-unit.target: External editing is now governed by the “Use external editor” permission to allow non-managers to use it. Users must also have the permissions to edit/modify the objects they edit, plus do WebDAV locking if desired. Thanks to Reineke and others.

trans-unit.source: External editor cannot detect when you have finished editing a single file. Objects edited with Dreamweaver will remain locked on the server until you exit the application. As with Photoshop above, you may want to turn off locking for Dreamweaver.
trans-unit.target: 外部编辑器无法检测您何时完成了单个文件的编辑。用Dreamweaver编辑的对象将一直锁定在服务器上,直到您退出应用程序。与上面的Photoshop一样,您可能希望关闭Dreamweaver的锁定功能。

trans-unit.source: External editor will attempt to load a plugin for any application before using the general editor control method. It does this by matching the name of the application executable file (sans extension) in the editor command line with the available plugins.
trans-unit.target: 外部编辑器会在使用一般编辑器控制方法之前尝试为任何应用程序加载插件。它通过将编辑器命令行中的应用程序可执行文件的名称(无扩展名)与可用的插件进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: Factored out external editor link generator. Product now registers a global method
trans-unit.target: 剔除了外部编辑器链接生成器的因素。产品现在注册了一个全局方法

trans-unit.source: Fix bug detecting basic auth info from older versions of CookieCrumber. Thanks to David D. Smith and Federico Sevilla III.
trans-unit.target: 修复从旧版本CookieCrumber中检测基本认证信息的错误。感谢 David D.Smith 和 Federico Sevilla III。

trans-unit.source: Fix encoding bug in windows binary. Thanks to Chris McDonough.
trans-unit.target: 修正windows二进制中的编码错误。感谢Chris McDonough。

trans-unit.source: Fix zmi-patches for Zope 4. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 为Zope 4修复zmi-patches。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fixed NameError bug in unlock retry code. Thanks to Federico Sevilla III.
trans-unit.target: 修正了解锁重试代码中的NameError错误。感谢 Federico Sevilla III。

trans-unit.source: Fixed Windows “body_file” bug.
trans-unit.target: Fixed Windows “body_file” bug.

trans-unit.source: Fixed Windows config file locator. It now looks in the program directory and then the user’s home directory (if specified)
trans-unit.target: Fixed Windows config file locator. It now looks in the program directory and then the user’s home directory (if specified)

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug where very short editing sessions where no changes were made could make EE think the editor never launched. Thanks to Maik Ihde.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个bug,即如果编辑时间很短,没有进行任何修改,EE会认为编辑器从未启动过。感谢 Maik Ihde。

trans-unit.source: Fixed acquisition issue in manage_main.dtml to sync up with the same fix applied to Zope.
trans-unit.target: 修正了manage_main.dtml中的采集问题,使其与应用于Zope的修正同步。

trans-unit.source: Fixed auth bug when product was used with mysqlUserFolder. Thanks to ViNiL.
trans-unit.target: 修正了产品与mysqlUserFolder一起使用时的auth bug。感谢ViNiL。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug editing large (chunked) files and images. External editor now streams their data properly to the client. Thanks to all the users who reported various symptoms of this bug.
trans-unit.target: 修正了编辑大型(分块)文件和图像的错误。外部编辑器现在可以正确地将其数据流传到客户端。感谢所有报告这个bug各种症状的用户。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug editing objects inside a Squishdot site. Thanks to Kevin Salt.
trans-unit.target: 修正了在Squishdot网站内编辑对象的错误。感谢Kevin Salt。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in Windows registry editor lookup.
trans-unit.target: 修正了Windows注册表编辑器查找的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug setting the editor on Posix platforms.
trans-unit.target: 修正了在Posix平台上设置编辑器的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug which happened under Win32 when editing an Excel file using the Excel plugin where the symptom was a “Call was rejected by callee” COM error. Thanks to Chris McDonough.
trans-unit.target: Fixed bug which happened under Win32 when editing an Excel file using the Excel plugin where the symptom was a “Call was rejected by callee” COM error. Thanks to Chris McDonough.

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug with editing binary data on Windows. Thanks to Eric Kamm.
trans-unit.target: 修正了在Windows上编辑二进制数据的错误。感谢 Eric Kamm。

trans-unit.source: Fixed content_type bug, now checks if it is callable. Thanks to Arnaud Bienvenu.
trans-unit.target: 修正了content_type的bug,现在可以检查它是否可调用。感谢Arnaud Bienvenu。

trans-unit.source: Fixed dangling dav lock bug on fatal errors. Thanks to Marc St-Jean.
trans-unit.target: 修正了dangling dav锁的致命错误。感谢 Marc St-Jean。

trans-unit.source: Fixed https detection bug. External editor is now tested and working with https. Many thanks to Hans-Dieter Stich and Martin Groenemeyer for their assistance and ideas.
trans-unit.target: 修正了https检测错误。外部编辑器现在已经测试过了,并且可以使用https。非常感谢Hans-Dieter Stich和Martin Groenemeyer的帮助和想法。

trans-unit.source: Fixed issue with ‘manage_FTPget’ overriding the ‘Content-Type’ header.
trans-unit.target: Fixed issue with ‘manage_FTPget’ overriding the ‘Content-Type’ header.

trans-unit.source: Fixed packaging bug in Windows binary which disabled several plugins. This fixes “Editor did not launch properly” errors for MSOffice among others.
trans-unit.target: Fixed packaging bug in Windows binary which disabled several plugins. This fixes “Editor did not launch properly” errors for MSOffice among others.

trans-unit.source: Fixed product uninstallation bug
trans-unit.target: 修正产品卸载错误

trans-unit.source: Fixed reflective XSS in findResult. This applies PloneHotfix20170117. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修正了findResult中的反射式XSS。这适用于PloneHotfix20170117。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed trailing newline bug in encoded auth data coming from CookieCrumbler. Thanks to Harald Koschinski.
trans-unit.target: 修正了来自 CookieCrumbler 的编码 auth 数据中的尾部换行错误。感谢 Harald Koschinski。

trans-unit.source: For Zope 4, please use release 2.0 and upwards. For Zope releases prior to 4.0, please use ExternalEditor releases from the 1.1 branch.
trans-unit.target: 对于Zope 4,请使用2.0及以上版本。对于4.0之前的Zope版本,请使用1.1分支的ExternalEditor版本。

trans-unit.source: For tighter client-side integration, external editor has a plugin system that allows it to interact directly with supported applications.
trans-unit.target: 为了实现更紧密的客户端集成,外部编辑器有一个插件系统,可以直接与支持的应用程序交互。

trans-unit.source: General options (i.e.,
trans-unit.target: 一般选项(即:

trans-unit.source: Get the data back into Zope when the changes are saved
trans-unit.target: 保存更改后,将数据返回到Zope中。

trans-unit.source: How it Works
trans-unit.target: 它是如何工作的

trans-unit.source: I hope you enjoy using this software. If you have any comments, suggestions or would like to report a bug, send an email to the author:
trans-unit.target: 希望你喜欢使用这个软件。如果您有任何意见、建议或想报告一个错误,请发邮件给作者。

trans-unit.source: If Word was exited before a user actively saved, if there were outstanding changes in the document being edited, those changes would not be saved to the server despite the user answering “yes” to the “do you want to save before you exit” dialog presented by Word.
trans-unit.target: If Word was exited before a user actively saved, if there were outstanding changes in the document being edited, those changes would not be saved to the server despite the user answering “yes” to the “do you want to save before you exit” dialog presented by Word.

trans-unit.source: If so configured, the helper app sends a WebDAV lock request back to Zope to lock the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样配置,帮助程序会向Zope发送一个WebDAV锁请求来锁定对象。

trans-unit.source: If these permissions are not set in Zope, then the helper application will receive unauthorized errors from Zope which it will present to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Zope中没有设置这些权限,那么帮助程序将收到来自Zope的未经授权的错误,它将呈现给用户。

trans-unit.source: If users wish to use the built-in locking support, they must have the “WebDAV access”, “WebDAV Lock items” and “WebDAV Unlock items” permissions for the objects they are editing.
trans-unit.target: If users wish to use the built-in locking support, they must have the “WebDAV access”, “WebDAV Lock items” and “WebDAV Unlock items” permissions for the objects they are editing.

trans-unit.source: If your favorite editor needs a plugin because the general support is not good enough, please let me know. Keep in mind that I must be able to run a copy of the application in order to develop a plugin for it. So, unless the application is free, or a full demo is available for download I won’t be able to help much. Plugins are not difficult to write, and I encourage you to write one for your favorite editor, start by reading one of the existing ones. I am happy to include third-party plugins with the distribution.
trans-unit.target: If your favorite editor needs a plugin because the general support is not good enough, please let me know. Keep in mind that I must be able to run a copy of the application in order to develop a plugin for it. So, unless the application is free, or a full demo is available for download I won’t be able to help much. Plugins are not difficult to write, and I encourage you to write one for your favorite editor, start by reading one of the existing ones. I am happy to include third-party plugins with the distribution.

trans-unit.source: Improved behavior when saving after lock attempts fail.
trans-unit.target: 改进了锁定尝试失败后保存时的行为。

trans-unit.source: Improved open file check in Word and Powerpoint plugins thanks to Yura Petrov.
trans-unit.target: 改进了Word和Powerpoint插件中的打开文件检查,感谢Yura Petrov。

trans-unit.source: Initial release
trans-unit.target: 初次发布

trans-unit.source: Integrating with External Editor
trans-unit.target: 与外部编辑器集成

trans-unit.source: It is trivial to get the browser to fire up your editor when you download a particular type of data with your browser. But that does you little good, since the browser no longer involves itself once the data is downloaded. It just creates a temp file and fires off the registered application, passing it the file path. Once the editor is running, it is only aware of the local file, and has no concept of where it originated from.
trans-unit.target: 当你用浏览器下载某类数据时,让浏览器启动你的编辑器是很琐碎的。但这对你没有什么好处,因为一旦数据被下载,浏览器就不再涉及自己。它只是创建一个临时文件并启动注册的应用程序,并将文件路径传递给它。一旦编辑器运行,它只知道本地文件,而对它的来源没有概念。

trans-unit.source: Locks objects while they are being edited. Automatically unlocks them when the editing session ends.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑对象时锁定它们。当编辑会话结束时,自动解锁对象。

trans-unit.source: Made it possible to edit objects that are methods of ZClasses. Thanks to Jim Washington
trans-unit.target: 实现了编辑Z类方法的对象。感谢 Jim Washington

trans-unit.source: Made manage_FTPget the default source for the editable content, instead of document_src which was broken for CMF Wiki Pages.
trans-unit.target: 让manage_FTPget成为可编辑内容的默认源,而不是CMF Wiki页面的document_src。

trans-unit.source: Modified the cache’s parameters - special case for MSIE
trans-unit.target: Modified the cache’s parameters - special case for MSIE

trans-unit.source: Moved code to https://github.com/zopefoundation/Products.ExternalEditor
trans-unit.target: Moved code to https://github.com/zopefoundation/Products.ExternalEditor

trans-unit.source: Moved the sources of the client to another package : collective.zopeedit
trans-unit.target: 将客户端的源码移到了另一个包:collective.zopeedit。

trans-unit.source: Now the key to getting this to work is solving the problem that the editor cannot know about Zope, and must only deal with local files. Also, there is no standard way to communication with editors, so the only communication channel can be the local file which contains the object’s content or code.
trans-unit.target: Now the key to getting this to work is solving the problem that the editor cannot know about Zope, and must only deal with local files. Also, there is no standard way to communication with editors, so the only communication channel can be the local file which contains the object’s content or code.

trans-unit.source: Now works on Windows (applause) using Pythonwin. Much overall refactoring to abstract process control. Thanks to Oliver Deckmyn, Gabriel Genellina and Arno Gross for testing, patches and suggestions.
trans-unit.target: 现在可以在Windows上使用Pythonwin工作了(掌声)。整体重构了很多抽象的过程控制。感谢 Oliver Deckmyn、Gabriel Genellina 和 Arno Gross 的测试、补丁和建议。

trans-unit.source: Now, this may look a bit odd to you if you are used to tacking views on to the end of the URL. Because
trans-unit.target: 现在,如果你习惯于在URL的末尾加上视图,这可能会让你觉得有点奇怪。因为

trans-unit.target: Ok, so this all sounds a bit too good to be true, no? So how the heck does it work anyway? First I’ll give you a block diagram:

trans-unit.source: Older pyc files for plugins were included in the 0.9 release. This version has the most up to date plugins.
trans-unit.target: 0.9版本中包含了较旧的插件pyc文件。这个版本有最新的插件。

trans-unit.source: On Windows this generally means using COM to invoke the application, open the content file and wait for the user to save and close the file. Because each application has different remote scripting capabilities and APIs, editor specific plugins must be written tailored to each supported application and platform.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上,这通常意味着使用COM调用应用程序,打开内容文件并等待用户保存和关闭文件。因为每个应用程序都有不同的远程脚本能力和API,所以必须根据每个支持的应用程序和平台来编写特定的编辑器插件。

trans-unit.source: Only run ExpandEnvironmentStrings on win32 systems.
trans-unit.target: 仅在win32系统上运行ExpandEnvironmentStrings。

trans-unit.target: 选项

trans-unit.source: Permissions
trans-unit.target: 权限

trans-unit.source: Photoshop
trans-unit.target: Photoshop

trans-unit.source: Photoshop’s COM API is quite limited, and external editor cannot detect that you have closed a file until you exit the entire application (it can still detect saves). Therefore you may want to turn off DAV locking (use_locks=0) or borrow locks (always_borrow_locks=1) when using it.
trans-unit.target: Photoshop’s COM API is quite limited, and external editor cannot detect that you have closed a file until you exit the entire application (it can still detect saves). Therefore you may want to turn off DAV locking (use_locks=0) or borrow locks (always_borrow_locks=1) when using it.

trans-unit.source: Plugin Notes
trans-unit.target: 插件说明

trans-unit.source: Prepare for Python 2 / 3 compatibility [davilima6]
trans-unit.target: 为Python 2/3的兼容性做准备[davilima6]

trans-unit.source: Properly escape hyphens in man page. Thanks to Federico Sevilla III.
trans-unit.target: 正确地转义人页中的连字符。感谢Federico Sevilla III。

trans-unit.source: Purged old Zope 2 Interface interfaces for Zope 2.12 compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 为了兼容Zope 2.12,清理了旧的Zope 2接口。

trans-unit.source: Quote variable in manage_tabs to avoid XSS. From Products.PloneHotfix20160830. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 在manage_tabs中引用变量以避免XSS。From Products.PloneHotfix20160830.[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Refactored link generation code in manage_main so that it uses the parent’s absolute_url rather than URL1. Thanks to Jim Washington
trans-unit.target: Refactored link generation code in manage_main so that it uses the parent’s absolute_url rather than URL1. Thanks to Jim Washington

trans-unit.source: Removed implicit save in Configuration class destructor
trans-unit.target: 删除了 "配置 "类析构器中的隐式保存。

trans-unit.source: Removed imports from Globals.
trans-unit.target: 从Globals中删除了进口。

trans-unit.source: Removed stderr writes to cure “Invalid File Descriptor” errors on Windows. Thanks to Martijn Peters.
trans-unit.target: Removed stderr writes to cure “Invalid File Descriptor” errors on Windows. Thanks to Martijn Peters.

trans-unit.source: Rewrote “Editor did not launch” error message so it makes more sense.
trans-unit.target: Rewrote “Editor did not launch” error message so it makes more sense.

trans-unit.source: Sections
trans-unit.target: 栏目

trans-unit.source: So, let’s take a step by step look at how it works:
trans-unit.target: So, let’s take a step by step look at how it works:

trans-unit.source: The
trans-unit.target: De

trans-unit.source: The “title” attribute of the object being externally edited is now available within the set of headers returned by EE to the zopeedit client.
trans-unit.target: The “title” attribute of the object being externally edited is now available within the set of headers returned by EE to the zopeedit client.

trans-unit.source: The URL to kick off the external editor on this document would be:
trans-unit.target: 在此文档上启动外部编辑器的网址是:。

trans-unit.source: The Zope External Editor is a new way to integrate Zope more seamlessly with client-side tools. It has the following features:
trans-unit.target: Zope外部编辑器是一种将Zope与客户端工具更无缝集成的新方式。它具有以下特点。

trans-unit.source: The available options for all sections of the config file are:
trans-unit.target: 配置文件中所有部分的可用选项是。

trans-unit.source: The browser receives the request, and finds our helper application registered for “application/x-zope-edit”. It saves the response data locally to disk and spawns the helper app to process it.
trans-unit.target: The browser receives the request, and finds our helper application registered for “application/x-zope-edit”. It saves the response data locally to disk and spawns the helper app to process it.

trans-unit.source: The configuration file follows the standard Python ConfigParser format, which is pretty much like the old .ini file format from windows. The file consists of sections and options in the following format:
trans-unit.target: 配置文件遵循标准的Python ConfigParser格式,这和windows中的老式.ini文件格式差不多。该文件由以下格式的部分和选项组成。

trans-unit.source: The editor is launched as a sub-process of the helper app, passing it the file containing the content data.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器作为帮助程序的子进程启动,向它传递包含内容数据的文件。

trans-unit.source: The external editor product in zope installs a globally available object that can format objects accessible through FTP/DAV for use by the helper application. You can take advantage of this functionality easily in your own content management applications.
trans-unit.target: zope中的外部编辑器产品安装了一个全局可用的对象,它可以格式化通过FTP/DAV访问的对象,供帮助程序使用。您可以在自己的内容管理应用程序中轻松利用这一功能。

trans-unit.source: The helper app, reads its config file and the response data file. The meta-data from the file is parsed and the content is copied to a new temporary file. The appropriate editor program is determined based on the data file and the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 帮助程序,读取其配置文件和响应数据文件。对文件中的元数据进行解析,并将内容复制到一个新的临时文件中。根据数据文件和配置确定合适的编辑程序。

trans-unit.source: The helper application exits.
trans-unit.target: 帮助程序退出。

trans-unit.source: The helper application supports several configuration options, each of which can be triggered in any combination of object meta-type, content-type or domain. This allows you to create appropriate behavior for different types of Zope objects and content or even different servers. The configuration file is stored in the file “~/.zope-external-edit” (Unix) or “~ZopeEdit.ini” (Windows). If no configuration file is found when the helper application starts, a default config file is created in your home directory.
trans-unit.target: The helper application supports several configuration options, each of which can be triggered in any combination of object meta-type, content-type or domain. This allows you to create appropriate behavior for different types of Zope objects and content or even different servers. The configuration file is stored in the file “~/.zope-external-edit” (Unix) or “~ZopeEdit.ini” (Windows). If no configuration file is found when the helper application starts, a default config file is created in your home directory.

trans-unit.source: The method is ‘externalEditLink_(object)’. The object argument is the object to create the link for if appropriate. Here is some example page template code that inserts links to objects in the current folder and the external editor icon where appropriate:
trans-unit.target: The method is ‘externalEditLink_(object)’. The object argument is the object to create the link for if appropriate. Here is some example page template code that inserts links to objects in the current folder and the external editor icon where appropriate:

trans-unit.source: The product code on the server creates a response that encapsulates the necessary meta-data (URL, meta-type, content-type, cookies, etc) and the content of the Zope object, which can be text or binary data. The response has the contrived content-type “application/x-zope-edit”.
trans-unit.target: The product code on the server creates a response that encapsulates the necessary meta-data (URL, meta-type, content-type, cookies, etc) and the content of the Zope object, which can be text or binary data. The response has the contrived content-type “application/x-zope-edit”.

trans-unit.source: The sections of the configuration file specify the types of objects and content that the options beneath them apply to.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的各部分指定了它们下面的选项所适用的对象和内容的类型。

trans-unit.source: There is only one mandatory section ‘[general]’, which should define all of the above options that do not have a default value. If no other section defines an option for a given object, the general settings are used.
trans-unit.target: There is only one mandatory section ‘[general]’, which should define all of the above options that do not have a default value. If no other section defines an option for a given object, the general settings are used.

trans-unit.source: This allows external editor to play better with applications making use of traversal magic of their own. Thanks to Tres Seaver.
trans-unit.target: 这使得外部编辑器可以更好地发挥自己利用遍历魔法的应用。感谢Tres Seaver。

trans-unit.source: This is only a shortcut and specifying the full application path will still use the plugin where possible.
trans-unit.target: 这只是一个快捷方式,指定完整的应用路径仍然会尽可能地使用该插件。

trans-unit.source: This scheme allows you to specify an extension by content-type, the editor by meta-type, the locking settings by domain and the remaining options under general for a given object.
trans-unit.target: 该方案允许你按内容类型指定扩展,按元类型指定编辑器,按域指定锁定设置,并在常规下为给定对象指定其余选项。

trans-unit.source: This system allows external editor to efficiently connect to running applications without relaunching them and therefore fully support MDI environments. The following applications currently have plugin support:
trans-unit.target: 本系统允许外部编辑器有效地连接到正在运行的应用程序,而无需重新启动它们,因此完全支持MDI环境。目前支持插件的应用有以下几种。

trans-unit.source: To solve this problem, I have developed a helper application whose job is essentially two-fold:
trans-unit.target: 为了解决这个问题,我开发了一个助手应用程序,它的工作基本上有两个方面。

trans-unit.source: Unix editor command line parsing is much more robust now and properly handles quoted arguments. You can also specify the “$1” placeholder in the editor command to denote where the content file name is inserted. If omitted it is appended to the end of the command line. “%1” continues to work similarly for Windows. Thanks to Marc St-Jean.
trans-unit.target: Unix editor command line parsing is much more robust now and properly handles quoted arguments. You can also specify the “$1” placeholder in the editor command to denote where the content file name is inserted. If omitted it is appended to the end of the command line. “%1” continues to work similarly for Windows. Thanks to Marc St-Jean.

trans-unit.source: Update dtml to Zope trunk.
trans-unit.target: 更新dtml到Zope主干。

trans-unit.source: Update manage_main, manage_tabs, and findResult monkey patches to include fixes from Zope 2.12.
trans-unit.target: 更新manage_main、manage_tabs和findResult猴子补丁,以包含Zope 2.12的修复。

trans-unit.source: Updated package metadata to be usable as a package.
trans-unit.target: 更新了包的元数据,可以作为包使用。

trans-unit.source: Use of the application is about as easy as using the ZMI once your browser is configured (see the installation instructions). To edit an object externally, just click on the pencil icon next to the object in the ZMI. The object will be downloaded and opened using the editor application you have chosen (you will be prompted the first time to choose an editor).
trans-unit.target: 一旦您的浏览器配置好,应用程序的使用就像使用ZMI一样简单(参见安装说明)。要从外部编辑一个对象,只需在ZMI中点击对象旁边的铅笔图标。对象将被下载,并使用您选择的编辑器应用程序打开(第一次会提示您选择编辑器)。

trans-unit.source: Use rfc822.Message for parsing the metadata of the file being edited.
trans-unit.target: 使用 rfc822.Message 来解析被编辑文件的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Using It
trans-unit.target: 使用它

trans-unit.source: When integrating External Editor with a CMS that already uses DAV locks, it will, by default allow users to borrow locks made on the server after displaying a confirmation dialog box. Although you can make this automatic by specifying ‘always_borrow_locks = 1’ in the External Editor config file, it may be desireable to make this the default behavior when using that server. To facilitate this, you can specify that locks should be automatically borrowed in the URL (New in 0.7), i.e:
trans-unit.target: When integrating External Editor with a CMS that already uses DAV locks, it will, by default allow users to borrow locks made on the server after displaying a confirmation dialog box. Although you can make this automatic by specifying ‘always_borrow_locks = 1’ in the External Editor config file, it may be desireable to make this the default behavior when using that server. To facilitate this, you can specify that locks should be automatically borrowed in the URL (New in 0.7), i.e:

trans-unit.source: When the editor is closed, the content file is checked one more time and uploaded if it has changed. Then a WebDAV unlock request is sent to Zope.
trans-unit.target: 当编辑器关闭时,再检查一次内容文件,如果有变化就上传。然后向Zope发送WebDAV解锁请求。

trans-unit.source: When using the Excel plugin, errors were intermittently raised to the user in the form “Fatal error: <unknown>.Path” and the user could subsequently not save the document back to Zope because the external editor process had quit.
trans-unit.target: When using the Excel plugin, errors were intermittently raised to the user in the form “Fatal error: <unknown>.Path” and the user could subsequently not save the document back to Zope because the external editor process had quit.

trans-unit.source: When using the Excel plugin, errors were seen by users like “TypeError: This object does not support enumeration”. We now make the user deal with these.
trans-unit.target: When using the Excel plugin, errors were seen by users like “TypeError: This object does not support enumeration”. We now make the user deal with these.

trans-unit.source: Workaround IE browser error when running over SSL. Thanks to Marc-Aurele Darche.
trans-unit.target: 解决通过SSL运行时IE浏览器的错误。感谢Marc-Aurele Darche。

trans-unit.source: Works with any graphical editor application that can open a file from the command line, including: emacs, gvim, xemacs, nedit, gimp, etc.
trans-unit.target: 可与任何可以从命令行打开文件的图形编辑器应用程序一起使用,包括:emacs、gvim、xemacs、nedit、gimp等。

trans-unit.source: Works with basic auth, cookie auth and Zope versions. Credentials are automatically passed down to the helper application. No need to reauthenticate.
trans-unit.target: 适用于基本认证、cookie认证和Zope版本。凭证会自动传递给帮助程序。无需重新认证。

trans-unit.source: You can now pass command line arguments to the editor in the config file, or wrap the editor in an xterm without using a shell script.
trans-unit.target: 现在,你可以在配置文件中向编辑器传递命令行参数,或者在不使用shell脚本的情况下将编辑器包裹在xterm中。

trans-unit.source: You can now specify from the server that the helper app should borrow a lock by passing borrow_lock=1 via the request, thus suppressing the dialog box which appears by default. Thanks to Shane Hathaway.
trans-unit.target: 现在,你可以通过请求传递 borrow_lock=1,从服务器指定帮助程序应该借用锁,从而抑制默认出现的对话框。感谢Shane Hathaway。

trans-unit.source: You click on the external editor link (the pencil icon) in the Zope management interface.
trans-unit.target: 您点击Zope管理界面中的外部编辑器链接(铅笔图标)。

trans-unit.source: You edit the object just like any other file. When you save the changes in your editor, they are automatically uploaded back to Zope in the background. While the object is open in your editor, it is locked in Zope to prevent concurrent editing. When you end your editing session (ie you close your editor) the object is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以像编辑其他文件一样编辑该对象。当您在您的编辑器中保存修改时,它们会在后台自动上传回Zope。当对象在您的编辑器中打开时,它在Zope中被锁定,以防止并发的编辑。当您结束您的编辑会话(即您关闭您的编辑器)时,对象将被解锁。

trans-unit.source: Zope External Editor
trans-unit.target: Zope外部编辑器

trans-unit.source: which can be called to generate the external editor icon link for any object.
trans-unit.target: 它可以被调用来为任何对象生成外部编辑器图标链接。

trans-unit.source: will return the proper response data for the object to edit. You can invoke it via a URL:
trans-unit.target: 将为要编辑的对象返回适当的响应数据。你可以通过一个URL来调用它。
